actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: Declaring that the preborn are persons entitled to the guarantees contained in the fifth, thirteenth, and fourteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States of America and prohibiting abortion within the United States.

summary.text: Human Life Protection Act - Declare that all human beings, from the moment of conception and without regard to age, health, or condition of dependency, are persons entitled to the guarantees in the fifth, thirteenth, and fourteenth amendments to the U.S. Constitution. Prohibits abortion in the United States and grants the Congress and the States concurrent enforcement power.

titles.title: Declaring that the preborn are persons entitled to the guarantees contained in the fifth, thirteenth, and fourteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States of America and prohibiting abortion within the United States.
